Class FitSmartUpgradeFirmwareOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adidas.sensors.api.FitSmartUpgradeFirmwareOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.adidas.micoach.batelli.controller.BatelliResponseHandler, GattCallback

    public class FitSmartUpgradeFirmwareOperation
extends Object
    Operation used for upgrading fit smart firmware

      • onOperationFinished

        public void onOperationFinished(int status,
                                int errorCode)
        Called by the executor after the operation has been finished byu itself or was finished due to disconnect or other bt le error. Note - the operation can be finished before execute is called.
        Parameters:
        status - is GATT_SUCCESS or GATT_FAILURE
        errorCode - the error code
